member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.Contracts.CreateTranscriptionRequest
member.summary: Request contract for creating a new transcription job. Expects multipart/form-data with the audio file and an optional instrument hint.

member.name: P:TranscriptionTool.Api.Contracts.CreateTranscriptionRequest.InstrumentHint
member.summary: Optional instrument hint to guide transposition and analysis. Allowed values: alto, tenor, baritone, soprano, auto.

member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.Domain.Transcription
member.summary: Represents a transcription job and its derived metadata.

member.name: P:TranscriptionTool.Api.Domain.AudioBlob.Kind
member.summary: original: uploaded mix; isolated: sax-only track after separation.

member.name: P:TranscriptionTool.Api.Domain.ExportArtifact.Format
member.summary: Export format content, e.g., MusicXML, MIDI, JSON preview.

member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.Domain.AppDb
member.summary: EF Core DbContext for the transcription domain.

member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.Services.ITranscriptionQueue
member.summary: Simple in-memory background queue and worker scaffold. Later we can replace with a durable queue (e.g., Hangfire, Azure Queue, or RabbitMQ).

member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.ITranscriptionService
member.summary: Facade for scheduling and managing transcription jobs.

member.name: T:TranscriptionTool.Api.TranscriptionService
member.summary: Default implementation that places jobs on an in-memory queue.
